conclusion: The task is to determine where car A will eventually stop based on power, collision, and deflection effects observed in the scene.
The image shows car A moving towards a group of blocks. The blocks include a small red block, larger cubes of various colors (green, purple, yellow, orange), and a multicolored spherical object.
Car A reaches the small red block first due to its position in the path of the car.
Car A strikes the small red block almost head-on.
Car A loses most of its speed in pushing the light red block aside.
After pushing the red block aside, nothing else lies directly in the new, slowed path of car A.
Car A rolls only a short additional distance after pushing the red block aside.
Car A comes to rest just beyond the spot where the red block was hit.
Car A eventually stops a little past the original position of the red block, well before reaching any of the larger cubes farther up-field.
